attributes.action: Reclaim assests that have been claimed under false pretences by Mp's and any others abusing their power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people who have been exploited abusing their power for personal gain, may have been given prison sentences or punishments to similar effects but after the punishment has been carried through these people are still allowed to enjoy their homes cars and thousands of pounds even afterwards, why is the money and assets not seized and confiscated and put back into good use, the same as it would any other criminal, it doesnt wash they are still criminals all the same and even if the abuse so called is within the law it is still rule bendingly and morally wrong. The country is in a mess and these people simply are adding to this mess for personal gain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
